snippet: Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference, where the company has typically unveiled new iPhones, is just a week away. And as usual, the Web is noisy with tech publications claiming to have the scoop on what's to come.
abstract: Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference, where the company has typically unveiled new iPhones, is just a week away. And as usual, the Web is noisy with tech publications claiming to have the scoop on what's to come.

headline.main: Rounding Up Apple Conference Chatter, From Maps to TV Apps
